artist: Artist: Vincent Trefex , et al.; Publisher: La Chaise Acoustique, Caen, France

description: Saddle stitched binding, decal of a figure and screenprinted text, designs, and figural illustration on black wove paper covers; 58 pp.

title: Purée Noire, no. 8
